column4: Is there any possible way to put something on the clipbord? I have coded a script to take screenshot and upload it into the imgur.com service then return the uploaded url. But I need to put that url into the clipboard, for that I just need the linux command! :/
wwwd, I tried that without success. I mean I have a variable with the url, and I don't know any wayof of passing that into xclip. Can you show me How to put "foo" onto clipboard using xclip?
Yep I tried that, somehwo tis not working in python, may be I need some other solution.
can you get xclip to work in bash?
hmm, well I'm not python handy so i don't really know tbh
i presume you can drop to the shell somehow like in perl and do it that way
Yeah I will try, thanks man! :)
tap the left shit key on boot up, should bring up grub
Btw do you happen to know a way of running a script when a short key is pressed?
I don't know what it is, I will check it out. Thanks!
